General.Name: Discovery Harbour Resources Corp
General.Description: Discovery Harbour Resources Corp., a junior resource company, engages in the acquisition, exploration, and evaluation mineral properties in North America. The company explores for gold. It holds an 100% interest in the Fortuity 89 property, which comprise 106 mineral claims located in Nye County, Nevada. The company is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 510-580 Hornby Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 3B6
